title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba -To the Swordsmith Village-
overview: A recap of Kimetsu no Yaiba episodes 43â€“45, with new footage and special end credits. Together with his comrades, Zenitsu and Inosuke, along with one of the top-ranking members of the Demon Slayer Corps, Tengen Uzui, Tanjiro embarks on a mission within the Entertainment District, where they encounter the formidable, high-ranking demons, Daki and Gyutaro.
